111.title: other

114.content: Stan was at his CIA job as usual when he went to ask the science guys something. He went into the experiment room and approached them. "Hey guys, can you find a way to make my son skip puberty?" Stan asked. "Woah, what's this?" He asked as he pointed to a blue vial. "It's a new experimental growth serum, it can cause a human to grow exponentially". Stan was immediately intrigued. "Could I be the subject for an experiment with the serum?" stan asked. "We'll do the paperwork and if it clears, then yes." After a few days, the program was ready. Stan was a new experimental giant who's purpose was to eliminate terrorists. When he arrived in Pakistine, he took the serum. He immediately grew to 50ft and ripped all of his clothes off. "This is amazing!" Stan said. He started stepping on villages and slowly squishing anyone he could find with his stinky feet. Stan was hungry. so he picked up a fruit vendor and looked at him. The man was screaming and squirming. He dangled him above his mouth and let go. He gulped and belched loudly. After stan's mission was declared a success, he was sent back to America. His new mission was to eliminate all terrorists in the US. Anyone Stan thought was a terrorist was sentenced to execution through many ways. He started with Liberals by finding anyone Democratic and was given a list of who was and wasn't. When he found a liberal, they were either put in his sweaty armpit, eaten alive, or smothered by Stan's big stinky ball sack. He found another liberal protesting about giant abuses and wedged him in between Stan's firm buttcheeks. The man screamed as Stan let out a silent fart. "Take a big wiff, cause that's the last thing you'll ever smell!" He then clenched his buttcheeks slowly, crushing each bone in his body. He was wildly flailing his legs until Stan clenched harder, crushing him fully.
114.title: American Dad- Stan

121.content: It was a warm summer day in New York. Luke decided to invite Gabe to play video games at the penthouse. Gabe came and they went into Lukes room to play their games. While they were playing their games Ravi was working on a growth serum. He wanted to make him and his brother bigger so they can get more ladies. He even made extra just in case. When Ravi finished the potion he burst into Lukes Room when he and Gabe were still playing video games. Ravi What have I told you about being in my room. He knew said Ravi but I have somethings amazing to tell you. Slow down said Luke,first I'd like you to meet my freind Gabe. Greetings said Ravi,Sup said Gabe. Anyway said Ravi, I wanted to tell you that I just finished working on a growth serum to make things or people (only boys) bigger. Really said Luke and Gabe with a sense of excitement in their voices. Yes said Ravi and this potion is irreversible which means we can't go back to normal size and it gives you the power to grow other boys too. No way said Luke and Gabe. Yes way said Ravi. Would you like to try it said Ravi. Yeah said Luke and Gabe. Luke and Gabe took two of the three potions while Ravi took the third. To Better and MUCH BIGGER life said Ravi as he brought the potion to his mouth. They all drank the potion. Not long after that Gabe's tummy started to growl, followed by a louder one from Luke's stomach and the loudest growl which shook the whole room came from Ravi's belly. It's working said Ravi. Soon Gabes blue shirt and pants were reduced to shreds as he hit 6 feet 7 feet 8 feet His head went through the roof of the penthouse as he hit 100 feet. Then Lukes T shirt and pants and Ravis vest and pants were also no match for these growing guys. Gabe and Ravi were soon 100 feet like Gabe only wearing there underwear like Gabe. They all stopped growing at 500 feet tall. Ravi said Luke I take back everything I said about you. They all smelled their armpits that were sweating and stinky with the penthouse house having no air conditioning. They then saw a man who looked like an ant on their size. A smile crossed all their faces.
121.title: Gabe Luke Ravi (Good Luck Charlie and Jessie)

124.content: Reese woke up in his bed, it seemed like a usual day. Malcolm was trying a new experiment and saw Reece get up. "Reece, can you do me a huge favor?" Malcolm asked. "Why the hell would I do something for free?" Reese replied. "Fine, do it for 5 bucks?". "Deal", he accepted. Malcolm told him it was an intelligence increaser but it was actually a growth serum that would make Reese grow a few inches at the most. He dropped it on him slowly, but lost his grip and spilled most of it. "Oh crap", Malcolm said. "So now I'll be really smart?" Reese asked. He noticed a tingling sensation throughout his body. He started to grow until he was 40 ft tall. "Oh my god! I'm a giant!" Reese said excitedly" His clothes were ripped apart when he grew. Reese lifted up his armpit and inhaled. His pits were incredibly sweaty after being in an un air conditioned room in the summer. He started taking giant steps until he found someone. A man on the street was trying to run, but Reese picked him up. "Hmmm, how should I kill you?" Reese asked. The man pleaded and begged to be spared but Reese wasn't having it. "I'll say...death by my armpit!" The man screamed and squirmed as Reese slowly put the man in his armpit, slowly closing it. He made an intense flex and it went without saying he was dead. Reese continued walking as he entered the city. "This is going to be amazing" Reese thought. He started off by walking slowly, making sure to step on those below his stinky feet. He knocked a man over and hovered his sweaty foot above him, lowering it slowly to give him time to scream. After the man was flattened, he decided to make it more fun. He grabbed another man on the bottom of his toes and started closing them slowly. The pudgy bald business man screamed and tried beating on the flesh but to no avail. He gargled and was slowly crushed inbetween Reese's stinky toes. "I squelched him like a grape!" Reese noted. A news reporter was trying to take video without being noticed near by, but Reese noticed. "I got you now!" Reese ran to the reporter and snatched him up. He dangled the man over his mouth and dropped him in and swallowed with a gulp as the screaming man fell into his stomach. Reese let out a loud belch and continued to rampage. He needed to take a poop now, so he found car trying to get away, he pushed it with his foot and flipped it on the side. The guy inside screamed as the door was ripped open. "Hope you like getting smothered in my poop!" Reese said. The man screamed as Reese put his butt over the man and pushed. An enormous turd fell fast and filled the entire car. The man couldn't move and as he screamed the shit slid down his throat as he was smothered. Reese continued on and
124.title: Reese- Malcolm in the middle

12433.content:
Reese awoke by feeling weight on his face. The weight felt big and heavy. Strangely, it also felt soft like skin or a pillow. He struggled to open his eyes but finally did and yawned. Then he saw it. It was a giant ass and his nose was between the crack, he also tasted it. “What the hell?!” Reese shouted. He heard a deafening laugh, it sounded like Dewey’s laugh, only much more loud!

Suddenly he felt the weight get up and he got up as well. He then saw that it was Dewey! He was also 40 feet tall and had no clothes. Reese was shocked. Dewey finally broke the silence with “Well what do you think?” Reese asked “How did you grow?!” Dewey replied “oh it was easy I just had too...” He paused for a moment. “Excuse me a second” he said. Dewey than proceeded to let out a massive burp and fart which rivaled the ones that Reece did earlier. “Ah that’s better”, he said. “Anyway, Malcolm was working on a formula to grow himself to stop you and I could not let that happen because I wanted to join in on the fun, so what I did was tie him down to the bed and farted on his face to knock him out so it’d be impossible for him to escape. Then I grabbed his potion and drank it whole and when I was big enough, I ate Malcolm!”Reece was astonished and amazed. All he could say was “Good Job Dewey, I never knew you had it in you to show Malcolm who’s boss, I’m proud of you, anyway how does it feel being so big?” “It feels great”, said Dewey.”Especially when I fart and crap on people.” He added with a smile. Reese smiled, “yeah it does feel great”, he replied.

Dewey grimaced as his belly gave a deep rumble and sharp 'prrrt' of a fart blasted out his rear. "I really gotta take a crap now" the boy groaned placing a hand over his rear.

Reese waved the stinky air released from Dewey's bowels and grinned. "Guess Malcolm wants to come out huh" he said smugly fondly rembering the many times he'd subjected his know it all of a brother to his bodily functions.

Dewey frowned before bursting into hysterical giggles. "Oh yeah, since I ate Malcolm he's my poop" he thrust his fist into the air triumphantly at the realization of the fate he'd forced on his brother.

With a theatrical flourish Reese lifted his own leg high and blasted out a powerful smelly fart. "I ate a guy a little while ago and he wants out too, let's go take a dump!". With that vulgar declaration the two giant boys set off to find the most entertaining place to empty their bowels.

While Malcom might have found the idea incredibly juvenile and disgusting he was in no position to object, his remains being embedded in one of the smelly turds Dewey had dropped on the once life filled learning institute. "you are so on" Resse said confidently, while his little brother had him beat in smell he knew he had the advantage in stomach capacity.

Reese just turned to the small group of horrified onlookers Dewey had left in his rush. With one casual swipe he picked up a bunch and popped them in his mouth like popcorn, swishing them around before swallowing and letting off an impressive belch. As nice as the people tasted to him Reese figured he needed to try harder just in case to win, so he stepped onto a road instantly causing a massive car pile up of frightened citizens. Reese picked up a car and dropped it into his mouth before swallowing it and the family within whole. The vehicle was just big enough to make a noticeable bulge in the boys throat as he sent it down to the pit of his stomach. Almost immediately the acids in his gut got to work trying to break down the car and as a result produced a lot of gas that billowed up out of his mouth like a volcano, although a substantial amount was also forced into his intestines to produce future farts.
